public interface BrandNameService<I extends Identifier>
extends QueryService<I>

BrandNameService - 29.02.2012

Interface describes a service that will provided look-up and search of brand names.

Method Detail

getBrandName

String getBrandName(I identifier)
Look-up the brand name for a provided identifier.

Parameters:
identifier - the identifier to look-up the brand name for
Returns:
brand name or empty string

searchBrandName

Collection<I> searchBrandName(String name,
                              boolean approximate)
Search for identifiers in the data-set who's brand name matches the provided name.

Parameters:
name - a brand name
approximate - lossen search criteria
Returns:
collection of identifiers that match the brand name (empty collection if none)
